thread.title: Confirming Judges, a Trump Win in 2017, May Get Tougher

author: Brent Kendall
title: Confirming Judges, a Trump Win in 2017, May Get Tougher
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Judicial confirmations can be rocky, high-drama affairs, but for President Donald Trump they were among the smoothest and most far-reaching accomplishments of his first year in office.
Now with midterm elections looming, Republicans are preparing for another big push on judges while they have the Senate majority. They will do it, however, with less margin for error.
